hero.title: Logistics solutions for the manufacturing industry
hero.description: We boost your plant's productivity with integrated processes and continuous supply.

intro.text: At Yobel we design comprehensive logistics solutions for manufacturing and industrial companies. We connect the flow of raw materials, components and finished products through warehousing, transportation, distribution and value-added services.

items.title: In-House Supply
items.description: We operate directly within your plants or production centers to ensure continuous flow of materials and components.

items.title: Industrial Warehousing
items.description: Advanced inventory management with WMS, batch control, weight, dimensions or material type.

items.title: Specialized Transportation
items.description: Planned routes for B2B supply, national distribution or finished goods export.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Kitting, industrial set assembly, technical packaging and part or spare reconditioning.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Comprehensive coordination of imports and exports of machinery, raw materials and industrial products.

benefits.title: Efficiency, control and operational safety
items: Continuous supply to avoid line interruptions.
Full traceability of supplies and finished products.
Integration with client ERP or MES systems.

items.title: Spare parts management
items.fullDesc: Control and fast dispatch of critical parts.

items.title: Assembly kitting
items.fullDesc: Component kit preparation by production order.

certificates.description: At Yobel, we guarantee quality, safety and industrial efficiency under international certifications that support every process in the production chain.
